H0.text: What is the title of Stephen King’s first novel published under his own name. Rage

H1.text: What is the title of Stephen King’s first novel published under his own name. The Shining

H2.text: What is the title of Stephen King’s first novel published under his own name. Salem's Lot

H3.text: What is the title of Stephen King’s first novel published under his own name. Carrie

A4.text: Carrie is the first published novel by American author Stephen King, released in 1974.

A5.text: the latter of which became his second published novel, being published in 1975.
